original_title: The Elegant Clockwork of the Universe
overview: Set in New York City, The Elegant Clockwork of the Universe chronicles the immediate days following a young woman, Mala Adou’s disappearance, and her boyfriend, Muhammad’s dogged drive to find her.  Muhammad Masood is a middle school teacher whose life is turned upside down when he awakens one morning to find his lover, Mala Adou, of six years gone—leaving behind everything.
tagline: Time travel will not be impossible... forever.
title: The Elegant Clockwork of the Universe
